pr_title: Improve test coverage for raw decoder

timeline.bodyText: good catch. Can we have test for that?
timeline.author: losipiuk

replies.bodyText: yes I'll add one/update the old one
replies.author: charlesjmorgan

timeline.bodyText:
Use larger values which span all the bytes for needed for given data type, so we are sure we are reading everything.
If you use 1 as test value for 8-byte char we can be reading just a single byte and still not-fail assertion. Sth like 0x1234567890abcdef will give better coverage.
timeline.author: losipiuk

timeline.message: Improve test coverage for raw decoder
Improve test coverage for raw decoder
